flawed_nl_solution:
In three years, Michael will have 30+100 = <<30+100=130>>130 trophies.
If Michael has 30 trophies now, Jack will have 10*30 = <<30*10=3000>>3000 in three years.
Altogether, Jack and Michael will have 3000+130 = <<3000+130=3130>>3130 handball trophies in three years.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 300, not 3000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
